item.title: AutoTalker
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

i havn’t used SCAR in sooooooooo * 100 long, i decided to make something pointless so here you go.

//Thiefmn6092 - AutoTalker
//Version: 1.0.0
//Comments: An AutoTalker, Doesn't use SRL because I didn't want to.
//Setup: Lines 15-22
program AutoTalker;

//Variable Definitions
var
   Username, Password: String;
   Text: Array of String;
   Counter: Integer;

//<-------------------

procedure SetupScript;
begin
    //SetArrayLength(Text, 10 + 1); //Sets Text Array Length, For some reason you cannot get it unless you set it. :-(

    Username:= 'Username Goes Here.';//Player USERNAME
    Password:= 'Password Goes Here.';//Player PASSWORD
    Text:= [
        'SampleText', //Copy and paste this exact line under if you want to add more.
        'Something else'
        ];
end;

procedure Talk;
begin
    for Counter:= 0 to GetArrayLength(Text)-1 do
    begin
        SendKeysSilent(Text[Counter] + chr(13));
        wait(random(3000));
    end;
    Counter:= 0;
end;


begin
    SetupScript;
    repeat
    Talk;
    until(false)
end.
